column4: is there a specific reason as to why i can't do any administrator taskes?
or why my login screen is glitched?
not even sudo, just some error that's not letting me do any auth for GUI admin tasks, Logan_.
Why is my administrative password wrong?
Though I can login with it, i can't authorize tasks.
Could there be an issue with linux itself?
How many users are there on your machine?
What does it do and why? I don't think it'd change a think.
The password for super user access would be the same as the password you use to authenticate
That matters little. What we want to do is get to the bottom of your issues.
invoke it from an authenticated terminal?
I don't care much for GUI's anyway
